::Lavatron::

Lavatron steps back with his left leg so that his right and only arm
would be in front, and catches Surgital's wrist in his hand. He powers
up his hand, letting a bolt of lightning directly into Surgital.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
>       Surgital tilts his head over to avoid the one lightning bolt,
but it skims his neck and gives him a jolt.  And then, he is struck
right in the chest by another lightning bolt.  He stumbled back, but
this time he was careful not to fall.
> 
>        "Now that my little Decepticon friend is out of the way, we
fight without distraction!" Surgital said, watching Tantrum go help
FireBlade and stuff.
> 
>        Surgital cackled, then threw a sideways punch at Lavatron's
head.
